name: Astralis [Alpha Release]
description:
CONTROLS

  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around the world
  • Press SHIFT to dash in the direction you are moving

PLATFORMS

  • You can stick to any side of a platform 
  • Platforms that have the [!] symbol will vanish after you jump off of them
  • Platforms that have the [~] symbol are broken and have a limited lifespan
  • Normal platforms have no symbol 

FODDIAN GAMEMODES have no normal platforms, ascend the map as fast as you can, faster dash cooldown 

  • The normal Foddian gamemode (top portal) is tall, wide, and fairly easy map
  • The Foddian Lite gamemode (left portal) is a smaller, wider, and faster map
  • The Foddian Extreme gamemode (right portal) is a taller, thinner, and more challenging map 

TRAVERSAL GAMEMODES [DISABLED] has a mix of all platforms, traverse the map to the east as fast as you can 

MISCELLANEOUS 

  • You may enter a specific seed into the "seed" input, so you can compete against your friends on a specific map [NOT AVAILIBLE ON ITCH.IO, SEE LINK BELOW]
  • Press [R] to restart the level 
  • Press [C] to copy the link to that level to share with people
  • Press [X] to disable particles

Dev note: Hello Otto, Ludwig, Michael, & Co.!  Big fan :) 

As you may be able to tell, this is not a complete game. I’m a very busy person, I’m a member of a FIRST Tech Challenge Robotics team, a member of multiple clubs such as Theatre Tech, Yearbook, and more. Long story short, I’m busy. 

It doesn’t take a genius to figure out that the purpose of the Ludwig Jam is to create new games for Ludwig to play in streams.

As such, rather than presenting you will a complete game, I’m presenting you with this concept of a game. If I had perhaps a week or two longer, I would be able to implement the art (which I already have created lol just needed like one or two more hours), the gamemodes I have temporarily disabled as they aren’t stable enough, and just overall a more fun and more developed game.

To see a more developed version of the game (with seeds and stuff like that) check it out here https://thesimg.github.io/astralis-alpha/

It is currently 5:57 ET and there are 3 minutes until deadline, so I’m going to keep this brief. Please feel free to reach out to me on Twitter @thesimg_ or on Discord at Sim#0465

Thank you! Graham/Sim
